0.title: AI guidance for your thought diary
0.description: Keeping an automatic thought diary can sometimes be challenging. Our AI recommendation system offers gentle prompts, supports you and guides you around common pitfalls so that working with your thoughts becomes clearer and more comfortable.

1.title: Personalized analysis of your entries
1.description: Share your experiences with our AI, and it will help you look at your situation from a fresh perspective. The system will offer supportive recommendations and highlight cognitive distortions so you can work with them more effectively.

2.title: Personal data security
2.description: You can set a password to enter the app, and your data is additionally encrypted. This provides a high level of protection and ensures that only you have access to your entries.

3.title: AI-powered speech recognition
3.description: We use advanced speech recognition with emotion analysis. The app adds punctuation and structures your text so it looks neat and clear. Get complete entries several times faster than typing by hand.

4.title: Sync across all your devices
4.description: Your entries are securely encrypted and stored on our server. This lets you work with your diary on different devices and have access to your data anytime, anywhere.

5.title: Full access to tests
5.description: Our tests are developed with input from professional psychologists and come with clear explanations. They help you understand yourself better and track changes in your state over time.

6.title: Unlimited access to the knowledge base
6.description: Weâ€™ve built a rich knowledge base on psychological well-being and keep expanding it. Read articles without limits and discover new ways to take care of yourself every day.

7.title: Attach images to your entries
7.description: Add images to your notes to convey emotions and context more precisely. All photos are synced across your devices and, if you choose, can be shared with your psychologist.

texts: Subscriptions for 3 and 12 months include a 3-day trial period. After the trial period ends, the corresponding amount for the selected period will be automatically charged.
By making the first payment, you agree to further automatic charges according to your chosen plan until you cancel it.
You can cancel your subscription at any time on this page. If you cancel the subscription before the trial period ends, no money will be charged from your card.
If you cancel the subscription renewal before the trial period ends, you will immediately lose access to the premium features.
If you cancel the subscription renewal after making a payment, you will retain access to the premium features until the end of the paid subscription period.
Refunds for a paid period of 1, 3, or 12 months are possible in the following cases:
1. The charge was made due to a technical error on our side.
In all other cases, after the trial period ends and a payment is made for 1, 3, or 12 months, refunds are not provided.
If you encounter any issues, you can always contact us via the feedback form in the app on the 'Profile' page.
